title: Steel I: China rises
authors: Richard Davies, Josh Hellings, Finn McEvoy
subtitle: The first in a three-part series. The era of Chinese steel, and the strategies—including state subsidies—that have led to its dominant position.
intro: The UK is in the grip of a steel crisis. With full nationalisation of the Scunthorpe works—home to the country’s last functional blast furnace—on the cards, we are devoting three newsletters to steel.
